description: Try our easy to follow Fairy Bread BBQ Hot Cross Bun recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fairy Bread BBQ Hot Cross Bun
name: Fairy Bread BBQ Hot Cross Bun Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Top with remaining hot cross bun half, then dust with icing sugar and remaining sprinkles. Serve with maple syrup.
